note.p: Scottish livestock farmer. Farmed 2,000 acres at Hindhope, Oxnam, Roxburghshire, from 1841 or earlier until at least 1881.
Census returns of Scotland 1841 (The National Archives of Scotland: Oxnam 1/1/390), 1851 (Oxnam 4/7), 1861 (Oxnam 2/7), 1871 (Oxnam 2/1), 1881 (Oxnam 2/6)
Scotland statutory deaths 802/1 Oxnam (Scotlandspeople.gov.uk, accessed 15 January 2020)
